Trade/Device Name(s): TD-4257 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TD-4257 Blood Glucose Monitoring System and TD-4257 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: TD-4257 Blood Glucose Monitoring System is for self-testing of glucose in capillary whole blood by individuals with diabetes at home; TD-4257 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System is for professional multiple patient use to monitor diabetes control via glucose measurement in capillary, venous, and neonatal whole blood.
